description.main: A cozy corner of the internet where friendship grows like acorns in autumn! 🐿️
description.subtitle: Join our wholesome Discord community for gaming, chatting, creative sharing, and endless fun.
description.welcome: Everyone is welcome in our digital forest!

hero.easterEgg: 🐿️ Squirrel says: "Nuts about you clicking me!"

squirrelCare.title: 🐿️ Virtual Squirrel Care
squirrelCare.subtitle: Take care of your virtual squirrel companion!

messages.playing: So much fun! Your squirrel enjoyed {activity}!
messages.sleeping: Zzz... Your squirrel had a peaceful nap!
messages.exercising: Great workout! Your squirrel feels energized!

squirrelNeighborhood.subtitle: Visit friends and explore the community!

gameCenter.title: 🎮 Squirrel Game Center
gameCenter.subtitle: Play mini-games to earn nuts, coins, and experience!

nutCatch.name: Nut Catcher
nutCatch.description: Catch falling acorns with your basket!

instructions.mobile: 📱 Mobile: Touch and drag to move basket
instructions.desktop: 💻 Desktop: Move mouse to control basket

memoryMatch.name: Squirrel Memory
memoryMatch.instructions: Tap cards to flip them and find matching pairs!

quickClick.name: Lightning Reflexes
quickClick.description: Click the targets before they disappear!
quickClick.instructions: Tap the targets as fast as you can!

treeJump.name: Tree Jumping
treeJump.description: Help the squirrel jump between branches!

easterEggs.title: 🎯 Easter Egg Collection
easterEggs.subtitle: Find hidden surprises around the site!

hints.title: Hints
hints.hint1: 🐿️ Click the mascot multiple times in the hero section
hints.hint2: 🌰 Look for clickable nuts in unexpected places
hints.hint3: 🎮 Play games to unlock special rewards
hints.hint4: 👀 Some text might be hiding secrets...
hints.hint5: 🌙 Dark mode might reveal hidden elements

collection.title: Your Collection
collection.empty: Start exploring to find easter eggs!

events.description: Regular game nights, movie streams, and special activities!

global.title: 🌍 Global Community
global.description: Members from all time zones - there's always someone online!

inclusivity.title: 🌈 Inclusivity

creativity.title: ✨ Creativity
creativity.description: We encourage sharing and creating together

rules.title: Community Guidelines
rules.beKind: Be kind and respectful to all members
rules.noSpam: Keep conversations relevant and avoid spam
